article.headline: Nicholls State 69, Texas State 66
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas (AP) -- Stefa Blaszczynski scored 16 points and Ryan Bathie added 15 to help Nicholls State rally from a large first half deficit to beat Texas State 69-66 on Saturday night. The Colonels, who trailed by as many as 15 points in the first half, came to within six at halftime and outscored the Bobcats 39-30 in the second half. Cyril Djoukeng had 14 points, including four 3-pointers, for the Colonels (8-13, 4-6 Southland). Michael Czepil had a team-high eight assists. Charles Dotson scored 22 points for the Bobcats (2-17, 0-8). JuShay Rockett and Trevor Cook each scored 10 points. Cook had nine rebounds.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
